item.title: f09f
item.description: f09f # pronounced fonf; is a simple statically typed language with simple but powerful syntax # Include # include standio; Byte # byte name = 10000000; Byte array # byte[] name; byte name = [10000000, 10000001]; Char # char letter = 'A'; Char array # char[] letter; char letter = ['A', 'B', 'C']; Int # int number = 4; Int array # int[] numbers; int numbers = [2, 5, 4]; Prec # prec percent = 3.
